metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21102 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In __efi_rt_asm_wrapper of efi-rt-wrapper.S, there is a possible bypass ofshadow stack protection due to a logic error in the code. This could leadto local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-260821414References: Upstreamkernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-21102` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic-lpae - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic-64k - 6.2.0-20.20
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

No subscription required
